      • sshCallExec

        public Exec.ExecResult sshCallExec(ConnectionInfo connInfo,
                          java.lang.String command,
                          java.lang.String inputForStdIn)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        connInfo - SSH connection details (see ConnectionInfo)
        command - Command to be executed
        inputForStdIn - Some commands expect some input to be entered in the stdin after the command is triggered (like "cat - > filename").
        The command then returns when the input finishes (equivalent to ctrl+d on the cmd).
        This field is used to store this input. If empty, no change will be made to the stdin.
        TODO Support for concurrent reading-from-stdin-and-writing-to-stdout
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • readConnectionStreams

        public Exec.ExecResult readConnectionStreams(com.trilead.ssh2.Session sess,
                                    java.io.InputStream output,
                                    java.io.InputStream error,
                                    long timeoutInMs)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Reads data from an active (trilead) SSH Session into a result-wrapper. The logic to check for the health of a connetion was inspired by SingleThreadStdoutStderr.java
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • authenticate

        public boolean authenticate(ConnectionInfo connInfo)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        perform authentication with the info provided in connInfo does not keep the session open, just tests if authentication works
        Parameters:
        connInfo - - holds information about connection details
        Returns:
        whether or not authentication worked
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
